abstract: On or about June 15, 1989, Admiral Truly and Frank Martin presented NASA's conceptual plan for an exploration program to Vice-President Dan Quayle. Presentations by Truly and Quayle to a variety of groups outside the administration ensued. These officials drew upon the following charts for their presentations. The charts, based on the technical material supplied by the NASA Working Group, were updated and rearranged as the presentations transpired.
title: Civil Space Exploration Initiative

publications.publicationName: The Decision to Send Humans Back to the Moon and on to Mars: Space Exploration Initiative History Project

related.title: The Decision to Send Humans Back to the Moon and on to Mars: Space Exploration Initiative History Project
